text: [Hamon] Kasone, ki ʙa nohaq az dijorason ronda sudand, [va gunohe nadostand] cuz in ki meguftand: «Parvardigori mo Alloh taolo ast». Va agar Alloh taolo [zulmu kufri] ʙarxe az mardumro ʙa vasilai ʙarxe digar daf' namekard, savmaaho[-i rohiʙon] va maoʙid [-i masehijon] va iʙodatgohho [-i jahudijon] va masocide, ki nomi Alloh taolo dar onon ʙisjor ʙurda mesavad, hatman, vajron megardid. Va Alloh taolo kasero, ki [dini] Uro jori dihad, jaqinan, jori mekunad. Be tardid, Alloh taolo qudratmandi sikastnopazir ast
